testcase.classname: Verify the Hotel booking in Adactin
testcase.name: Verify the login using valid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Adactin login page.........................................passed When User enters "Rakeshg6199" and "Rakesh123"..............................passed And User Clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User sees Search Hotel page............................................passed

testcase.classname: Verify the Hotel booking in Adactin
testcase.name: User Search for the hotel
testcase.system-out: Given User is on search page................................................passed When User selects "Melbourne" location......................................passed And User selects "Hotel Sunshine" hotels....................................passed And User selects "Double" room type.........................................passed And User selects "3 - Three" of rooms.......................................passed And User enters "06/05/2023" check-In and "08/05/2023" Check-out date.......passed And User selects "3 - Three" adults and children "2 - Two" per room.........passed And User clicks on search button............................................passed Then User should see select hotel page......................................passed

testcase.classname: Verify the Hotel booking in Adactin
testcase.name: User Select for the hotel
testcase.system-out: Given User is on select page................................................passed When User click on select hotel checkbox....................................passed And User clicks continue button.............................................passed Then User sees book a hotel.................................................passed

testcase.classname: Verify the Hotel booking in Adactin
testcase.name: User books a hotel
testcase.system-out: Given User is on book hotel page............................................passed When User Enters "Rakesh" first name........................................passed And User Enters "Kumar" last name...........................................passed And User Enters "abc" address...............................................passed And User Enters Credit card "1234567891234567" number.......................passed And User selects credit card "Master Card" type.............................passed And User select expiry "February" and "2022"................................passed And User enters CVV "123" Number............................................passed And User clicks book now button.............................................passed Then User gets the order id.................................................passed
